metadata.title: CVE-2018-7651 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description:
index.js in the ssri module before 5.2.2 for Node.js is prone to a regularexpression denial of service vulnerability in strict mode functionality viaa long base64 hash string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7651` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-ssri - 5.2.4-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-ssri package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2.4-2').
